information.role: The original brief (written by Michelle Wolfarth) posed a design challenge: reach out to a person[s] within the target audience, educate her [them] on the different varieties of tea and how proper temperature and steeping time can make a difference in the brewing of the ‘perfect cup’.
information.description: The Perfect Cup of Tea is a unique gift of 8 hand painted tea cups, knitted doilies, a handcrafted box, and a hand painted table cloth.
information.mediaDetail: Acrylic on ceramic, acrylic on wood, acrylic on canvas, textile, hemp rope.
